$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|My realm was founded by a true
visionary...and my task is to see
that vision through. That is all.$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|...I am not here by choice. I lost
a bet with Loki, and honor will not
allow me to go back on my word.$k$p$Sbs1000|
